AzureAd.ApiClientId: <Use API ClientID settings from Azure Portal for the DEV environment. Example: abcdefgh-ijkl-mnop-qrst-uvwxyx123456>
AzureAd.ApiAppIdUrl: <Use API AppIDUrl settings from Azure Portal for the DEV environment. Example: api://abcdefgh-ijkl-mnop-qrst-uvwxyx123456>

SqlConnections.Template: <Use database connection string for the DEV environment. Example: Server=<SqlSvrInstance01>;Database=<Database01>;Trusted_Connection=True;>
